text: A Pensioners’ grievance day meeting will be held at the Collectorate at 11 a.m. on February 24. The Director of Pensions from Chennai will preside over the meeting. Pensioners should send their two copies of their petitions along with details of residential address, name of the department, date of retirement, pension order copy, list of pension benefits, application status and reason for pending and contact telephone or mobile phone numbers to The Collector, District Collectorate, Dindigul, on or before February 10, according to a press release issued here.
title: Grievance day for pensioners
